SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t.cr_amount), 0) AS crAmount, IFNULL(SUM(t.dr_amount), 0) AS drAmount FROM dms_tb_cashflow t, dms_tb_cashflow_cat p, dms_tb_org_shop q WHERE t.cashflow_cid = p.cashflow_cid AND t.shop_id = q.shop_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND q.state = 'U' AND q.org_id = #orgId#
p.cashflow_code = #code#
t.shop_id = #shopId#

SELECT aaa.shop_id AS shopId, IFNULL(bbb.crAmount, 0) AS crAmount FROM dms_tb_org_shop aaa LEFT JOIN( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN p.cashflow_code = 'B' THEN t.cr_amount WHEN p.cashflow_code = 'C' THEN t.dr_amount * -1 END) AS crAmount, t.shop_id FROM dms_tb_cashflow t, dms_tb_cashflow_cat p WHERE t.cashflow_cid = p.cashflow_cid AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.cashflow_code in ('B', 'C') AND t.trade_date >= date_format(#gmtStart#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.trade_date <= date_format(#gmtEnd#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') GROUP BY t.shop_id) bbb on aaa.shop_id = bbb.shop_id WHERE aaa.state = 'U' AND aaa.org_id = #orgId#

SELECT t.cashflow_id AS cashflowId, t.bank_acct_id AS bankAcctId, t.summary, t.cr_amount AS crAmount, t.dr_amount AS drAmount, DATE_FORMAT(t.trade_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS tradeDate, t.trade_no AS tradeNo FROM dms_tb_cashflow t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.trade_date >= date_format(#gmtStart#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.trade_date <= date_format(#gmtEnd#, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AND t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId# AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
